__e: She followed in their footsteps, and he didn't.
And he is dreaming, I suppose... of following in the footsteps of Goethe and Schiller... and I hope he will.
All right, follow my footsteps, then jump to the trees.
There were only two pairs of footprints in the blood.
I must admit to hoping that you'll follow in my footsteps in the Church.
And then one day I saw a footprint in the sand and there you were.
